name: The S.O.S. Band
description: '''The S.O.S. Band''' (sometimes written as '''S.O.S. Band'''; abbreviation for '''Sounds of Success''') is an American [[Contemporary R&B|R&B]] and [[Boogie (genre)|electro-funk]] [[musical ensemble|group]] that gained fame in the 1980s. They are best known for the songs "[[Take Your Time (Do It Right)]]", "[[Just Be Good to Me]]", and "[[The Finest (song)|The Finest]]".
